channel.title: Notice board | Unimi
channel.description: General notice board of the University of Milan "La Statale"

item.title: Call for the English language development course in view of the B2 First (FCE) exam
item.description: Registration is open for the English language development course with a view to sitting the Cambridge B2 First (FCE) exam. Classes, for the whole duration of 20 hours, are taking place in person in June-July at the SLAM Centre according to the calendar reported in the call.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Call for CELI exams CELI 1 (A2) - CELI 2 (B1) - CELI 3 (B2) - CELI 4 (C1) levels on 26 and 27 June 2025
item.description: The call is open to register for the CELI 1 (A2) - CELI 2 (B1) - CELI 3 (B2) - CELI 4 (C1) exams scheduled on 26 and 27 June 2025.%0AN.B: seats for the CELI 1 A2, CELI 2 B1, CELI 3 B2 and CELI 4 C1 exams are sold out.%0A %0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: ‚ÄúOther Foreign Languages‚Äù Summer Session for Soon-to-be Graduates 2024/25
item.description: Special ‚ÄúOther Foreign Languages‚Äù Test Session dedicated to soon-to-be graduates in the summer session: Advanced English/Anglo-American, Basic and Advanced French, Basic and Advanced German, Basic and Advanced Spanish.%0A%0AüìÑ For more information please click here.

item.title: Call for the B1 Preliminary (PET) exam on 16 + 17 June 2025 - SOLD OUT
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English B1 Preliminary (PET) exam scheduled on 16 + 17 June 2025.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Call for the B2 First (FCE) exam on 16 + 17 June 2025 - SOLD OUT
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English B2 First (FCE) exam scheduled on 16 + 17 June 2025.%0A%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Faculty Championship 2025
item.description: To encourage students to participate in the competitions, classes will be suspended on the following dates: %0A‚Ä¢ Tuesday, 15 April 2025 ONLY for students of the LITA campus in Segrate (from 11 am onwards)%0A%0A‚Ä¢ Wednesday, 21 May 2025 for all students of the Faculty of Medicine (all classes scheduled for the day). %0A%0A
